propertyFile.content:
log4j.rootLogger=info, stdout, R
log4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
log4j.appender.stdout.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout

log4j.logger.org.apache.commons.httpclient=info
log4j.logger.httpclient.wire.content=info
log4j.logger.httpclient.wire.header=info

# Pattern to output the caller's file name and line number.
log4j.appender.stdout.layout.ConversionPattern=%-4r %-5p [%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss}]  %m%n

log4j.appender.R=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender
log4j.appender.R.File=c:/hjf/pljf_admin.log
log4j.appender.R.MaxFileSize= 100MB

# Keep one backup file
log4j.appender.R.MaxBackupIndex=1

log4j.appender.R.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.R.layout.ConversionPattern=%-4r %-5p [%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss}]  %m%n
log4j.appender.LOGFILE.encoding=UTF-8

# cz config
log4j.logger.hg.jfadmin.task.CZReturnTask=info,CZR
log4j.appender.CZR=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender
log4j.appender.CZR.File=/main/apps/jfPath/cz.log
log4j.appender.CZR.MaxFileSize= 100MB

# Keep one backup file
log4j.appender.CZR.MaxBackupIndex=1

log4j.appender.CZR.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.CZR.layout.ConversionPattern=%-4r %-5p [%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss}]  %m%n
# end cz config
propertyFile.name: log4j.properties

propertyFile.content:
#read by JfProperty.java

sms1234=true
passK=abc
isDetectionSignature=false
jfPath=/main/apps/jfPath
czPath=D:/
url99=${url99}
czTime=9:40
#picture server context path. 
picContextPath=http://app.51hjf.com:9119/hg-hjf-admin/
propertyFile.name: jf.properties
